description.english: Completed all chapters on any difficulty.
description.german: Alle Kapitel mit beliebigem Schwierigkeitsgrad abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as terminé tous les chapitres.
description.italian: Hai completato tutti i capitoli a una difficoltà qualsiasi.
description.spanish: Has completado todos los capítulos en cualquier dificultad.

description.english: Completed all chapters on any difficulty using Optimus Prime.
description.german: Alle Kapitel mit beliebigem Schwierigkeitsgrad mit Optimus Prime abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as terminé tous les chapitres avec Optimus Prime.
description.italian: Hai completato tutti i capitoli a una difficoltà qualsiasi utilizzando Optimus Prime.
description.spanish: Has completado todos los capítulos en cualquier dificultad con Optimus Prime.

description.english: Completed all chapters on any difficulty using Bumblebee.
description.german: Alle Kapitel mit beliebigem Schwierigkeitsgrad mit Bumblebee abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as terminé tous les chapitres avec Bumblebee.
description.italian: Hai completato tutti i capitoli a una difficoltà qualsiasi utilizzando Bumblebee.
description.spanish: Has completado todos los capítulos en cualquier dificultad con Bumblebee.

description.english: Completed all chapters on any difficulty using Wheeljack.
description.german: Alle Kapitel mit beliebigem Schwierigkeitsgrad mit Wheeljack abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as terminé tous les chapitres avec Wheeljack.
description.italian: Hai completato tutti i capitoli a una difficoltà qualsiasi utilizzando Wheeljack.
description.spanish: Has completado todos los capítulos en cualquier dificultad con Wheeljack.

description.english: Completed all chapters on any difficulty using Sideswipe.
description.german: Alle Kapitel mit beliebigem Schwierigkeitsgrad mit Sideswipe abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as terminé tous les chapitres avec Sideswipe.
description.italian: Hai completato tutti i capitoli a una difficoltà qualsiasi utilizzando Sideswipe.
description.spanish: Has completado todos los capítulos en cualquier dificultad con Sideswipe.

description.english: Completed all chapters on any difficulty using Grimlock.
description.german: Alle Kapitel mit beliebigem Schwierigkeitsgrad mit Grimlock abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as terminé tous les chapitres avec Grimlock.
description.italian: Hai completato tutti i capitoli a una difficoltà qualsiasi utilizzando Grimlock.
description.spanish: Has completado todos los capítulos en cualquier dificultad con Grimlock.

description.english: Completed all Challenge Mode missions on any difficulty.
description.german: Alle Herausforderungsmodus-Missionen mit beliebigem Schwierigkeitsgrad abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as terminé toutes les missions du mode Défi.
description.italian: Hai completato tutte le missioni in modalità Sfida a una difficoltà qualsiasi.
description.spanish: Has completado todas las misiones del modo Desafío en cualquier dificultad.

description.english: Completed half of all Challenge Mode missions on any difficulty.
description.german: Die Hälfte aller Herausforderungsmodus-Missionen mit beliebigem Schwierigkeitsgrad abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as terminé la moitié des missions du mode Défi.
description.italian: Hai completato metà delle missioni in modalità Sfida a una difficoltà qualsiasi.
description.spanish: Has completado la mitad de las misiones del modo Desafío en cualquier dificultad.

description.english: Collected all collectible items.
description.german: Alle sammelbaren Objekte gesammelt.
description.french: Tu as récupéré tous les objets de collection.
description.italian: Hai raccolto tutti gli oggetti collezionabili.
description.spanish: Has recogido todos los objetos coleccionables.

description.english: Collected half of all collectible items.
description.german: Die Hälfte aller sammelbaren Objekte gesammelt.
description.french: Tu as récupéré la moitié des objets de collection.
description.italian: Hai raccolto metà degli oggetti collezionabili.
description.spanish: Has recogido la mitad de los objetos coleccionables.

description.english: Synthesize 10 weapons.
description.german: 10 Waffen synthetisiert.
description.french: Tu as synthétisé 10 armes.
description.italian: Hai sintetizzato 10 armi.
description.spanish: Has sintetizado 10 armas.

description.english: Defeated 100 enemies with Vehicle/Dino Attacks.
description.german: 100 Feinde mit Fahrzeug-/Dino-Angriffen besiegt.
description.french: Tu as vaincu 100 ennemis avec des attaques en forme Véhicule / Dino.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 100 nemici con attacchi veicolo/dino.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a 100 enemigos con ataques vehículo/dinosaurio.

description.english: Defeated 100 enemies with Rush Attacks.
description.german: 100 Feinde mit Sturmangriffen besiegt.
description.french: Tu as vaincu 100 ennemis avec des charges.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 100 nemici con attacchi scatto.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a 100 enemigos con ataques de embestida.

description.english: Completed all chapters, earning the highest rank, on difficulty COMMANDER or greater.
description.german: Alle Kapitel mit der Schwierigkeit COMMANDER oder höher und dem höchsten Rang abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as terminé tous les chapitres et obtenu le plus haut rang en difficulté COMMANDANT ou plus.
description.italian: Hai completato tutti i capitoli ottenendo il grado massimo a difficoltà COMANDANTE o superiore.
description.spanish: Has completado todos los capítulos, con el rango más alto, en la dificultad Comandante o superior.

description.english: Finished the lift battle in Chapter 2 without taking damage from Insecticons.
description.german: Den Lift-Kampf in Kap. 2 ohne Schaden durch Insecticons abgeschlossen.
description.french: Au chapitre 2, tu as terminé la bataille du monte-charge sans être blessé par les Insecticons.
description.italian: Hai finito la battaglia del montacarichi nel capitolo 2 senza subire danni dagli Insecticon.
description.spanish: Has terminado la batalla del ascensor del capítulo 2 sin recibir daños de los Insecticons.

description.english: Used parrying to catch all of the following from the enemy: a drill, boulder, and missile.
description.german: Mit Paraden Folgendes von einem Feind gefangen: einen Felsen, eine Rakete und beide Bohrer-Arten.
description.french: Tu as utilisé la parade pour voler un rocher, un missile et les deux types de vrilles à un ennemi.
description.italian: Hai utilizzato la parata per prendere al volo: un masso, un missile o uno dei due tipi di trivella.
description.spanish: Has usado el bloqueo para recoger de un enemigo una piedra, un misil y ambos tipos de taladro.

description.english: Used Focus 100 times.
description.german: Fokus 100-mal eingesetzt.
description.french: Tu as utilisé la concentration 100 fois.
description.italian: Hai usato il focus 100 volte.
description.spanish: Has usado la concentración 100 veces.

description.english: After dodging, quickly countered with a melee attack 100 times.
description.german: Nach dem Ausweichen 100-mal schnell mit einem Nahkampfangriff gekontert.
description.french: Tu as immédiatement riposté avec une attaque de mêlée après une esquive 100 fois.
description.italian: Dopo aver schivato hai contrattaccato con un attacco veloce in mischia 100 volte.
description.spanish: Después de esquivar, has contraatacado cuerpo a cuerpo 100 veces.

description.english: After dodging, quickly countered with a ranged attack 100 times.
description.german: Nach dem Ausweichen 100-mal schnell mit einem Fernkampfangriff gekontert.
description.french: Tu as immédiatement riposté avec une attaque à distance après une esquive 100 fois.
description.italian: Dopo aver schivato hai contrattaccato con un attacco veloce a distanza 100 volte.
description.spanish: Después de esquivar, has contraatacado a distancia 100 veces.

description.english: Performed 100 successful head shots.
description.german: 100 erfolgreiche Volltreffer gelandet.
description.french: Tu as réussi 100 tirs en pleine tête.
description.italian: Hai eseguito 100 colpi alla testa senza sbagliare.
description.spanish: Has logrado 100 golpes a la cabeza.

description.english: In chapter 1, on difficulty COMMANDER or greater, slammed Devastator into a building 3 or more times.
description.german: Devastator in Kap. 1 mit der Schwierigkeit COMMANDER oder höher mind. 3-mal in Gebäude geschleudert.
description.french: Au chapitre 1, en difficulté COMMANDANT ou plus, tu as projeté Devastator sur un bâtiment 3 fois.
description.italian: Capitolo 1: a difficoltà COMANDANTE o superiore hai sbattuto Devastator contro un palazzo 3 volte.
description.spanish: En el capítulo 1, en dif. Comandante o más, has empotrado a Devastator en un edificio 3 veces o más.

description.english: In chapter 4, defeated Motormaster while racing him.
description.german: Motormaster in Kap. 4 im Rennen besiegt.
description.french: Au chapitre 4, tu as vaincu Motormaster pendant la course.
description.italian: Capitolo 4: hai sconfitto Motormaster mentre gareggiavi con lui.
description.spanish: En el capítulo 4 has derrotado a Motormaster mientras corrías contra él.

description.english: In chapter 6, on difficulty COMMANDER or greater, beat Soundwave without defeating any cassettes.
description.german: Soundwave in Kap. 6 mit der Schwierigkeit COMMANDER oder höher besiegt, ohne Kassetten zu besiegen.
description.french: Au chapitre 6, en difficulté COMMANDANT ou plus, bats Soundwave sans détruire de cassettes.
description.italian: Cap. 6: a difficoltà COMANDANTE o superiore hai sconfitto Soundwave senza abbattere alcuna cassetta.
description.spanish: En el capítulo 6, en dif. Comandante o más, has derrotado a Soundwave sin derrotar a ningún casete.

description.english: In chapter 1, on difficulty COMMANDER or greater, defeated Devastator without taking damage.
description.german: Devastator in Kap. 1 mit der Schwierigkeit COMMANDER oder höher besiegt, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Au chapitre 1, en difficulté COMMANDANT ou plus, tu as vaincu Devastator sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Capitolo 1: a difficoltà COMANDANTE o superiore hai sconfitto Devastator senza subire danni.
description.spanish: En el capítulo 1, en dificultad Comandante o superior, has derrotado a Devastator sin sufrir daños.

description.english: In chapter 2, on difficulty COMMANDER or greater, destroyed the shielding without taking damage.
description.german: In Kap. 2 mit Schwierigkeit COMMANDER oder höher, den Schutz zerstört, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Au chapitre 2, en difficulté COMMANDANT ou plus, tu as détruit le bouclier sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Capitolo 2: a difficoltà COMANDANTE o superiore hai distrutto lo scudo senza subire danni.
description.spanish: En el capítulo 2, en dificultad Comandante o superior, has destruido el escudo sin sufrir daño.

description.english: In chapter 3, on difficulty COMMANDER or greater, defeated Blitzwing without taking damage.
description.german: Blitzwing in Kap. 3 mit der Schwierigkeit COMMANDER oder höher besiegt, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Au chapitre 3, en difficulté COMMANDANT ou plus, tu as vaincu Blitzwing sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Capitolo 3: a difficoltà COMANDANTE o superiore hai sconfitto Blitzwing senza subire danni.
description.spanish: En el capítulo 3, en dificultad Comandante o superior, has derrotado a Blitzwing sin sufrir daños.

description.english: In chapter 4, on difficulty COMMANDER or greater, defeated Menasor without taking damage.
description.german: Menasor in Kap. 4 mit der Schwierigkeit COMMANDER oder höher besiegt, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Au chapitre 4, en difficulté COMMANDANT ou plus, tu as vaincu Menasor sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Capitolo 4: a difficoltà COMANDANTE o superiore hai sconfitto Menasor senza subire danni.
description.spanish: En el capítulo 4, en dificultad Comandante o superior, has derrotado a Menasor sin sufrir daños.

displayName.english: Don't Look Him in the Eye

description.german: Shockwave in Kap. 5 mit der Schwierigkeit COMMANDER oder höher besiegt, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Au chapitre 5, en difficulté COMMANDANT ou plus, tu as vaincu Shockwave sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Capitolo 5: a difficoltà COMANDANTE o superiore hai sconfitto Shockwave senza subire danni.
description.spanish: En el capítulo 5, en dificultad Comandante o superior, has derrotado a Shockwave sin sufrir daños.

description.english: In chapter 6, on difficulty COMMANDER or greater, defeated Soundwave without taking damage.
description.german: Soundwave in Kap. 6 mit der Schwierigkeit COMMANDER oder höher besiegt, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Au chapitre 6, en difficulté COMMANDANT ou plus, tu as éliminé Soundwave sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Capitolo 6: a difficoltà COMANDANTE o superiore hai sconfitto Soundwave senza subire danni.
description.spanish: En el capítulo 6, en dificultad Comandante o superior, has derrotado a Soundwave sin sufrir daños.

description.english: In chapter 7, on difficulty COMMANDER or greater, defeated Megatron without taking damage.
description.german: Megatron in Kap. 7 mit der Schwierigkeit COMMANDER oder höher besiegt, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Au chapitre 7, en difficulté COMMANDANT ou plus, tu as vaincu Megatron sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Capitolo 7: a difficoltà COMANDANTE o superiore hai sconfitto Megatron senza subire danni.
